DOC.brief_summary: The proposal study evaluate association achievement ongoing pregnancy hormonal level first day period stop rec-FSH/GnRH- antagonist cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Stop Menstruation Pregnancy Rates Antagonist Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: Ovarian stimulation achieve rec- FSH , Puregon® start day 2 cycle dose 200 IU/day . The dose rec-FSH remain unchanged stimulation day 10 cycle . If necessary increase dose rec-FSH 10 day stimulation , decrease dose rec-FSH due risk OHSS , patient drop study . To inhibit premature LH surge daily GnRH - antagonist ( orgalutran 0,25mg ) use morning day 6 stimulation . Final oocyte maturation achieve administration 10.000 IU HCG ( Pregnyl® ) soon ≥ 3 follicle ≥ 17 mm present . E2 level criteria HCG administration . Oocyte retrieval carry 36 hour HCG administration . Conventional IVF ICSI carry . Embryo transfer carry day3 day5 oocyte retrieval . Similar luteal support patient vaginal administration 600mg natural micronised progesterone three separate dos ( Utrogestan® 200mg 3xday ) start one day oocyte retrieval use . Hormonal assessment ( E2 , FSH , LH , Progesterone ) perform initiation stimulation , first day period stop every 2 day day HCG administration .
DOC.criteria: Age ≤ 39 year Body mass index 18 29 kg/m²¬ Regular cycle 2534 day Presence ovary Basal level estradiol ( ≤ 80 pg/ml ) progesterone ( ≤ 1.6ng/ml ) day one cycle Treatment IVF/ICSI Embryo transfer day 3 day 5 ( 1 2 embryo ) Patients enter study Presence endometriosis stage ≥3 ( AFS ) Polycystic ovarian syndrome ( Rotterdam criterion ) Need preimplantation genetic diagnosis ( PGD ) Azoospermia testicular sperm extraction ( TESE )
